item.title: Informed, Stochastic Walk
item.description: I’m going to describe what is going on here and make some improvements to this in the near future, but here is what I have so far: window.klipse_settings = { selector: '.cljs' }; (def canvas-id (atom "canvas")) (defn draw-line [coord1 coord2] (let [canvas (js/document.getElementById @canvas-id) ctx (.getContext canvas "2d")] (doto ctx (.moveTo (first coord1) (second coord1)) (.lineTo (first coord2) (second coord2)) (.stroke)))) (def step-length 10) (def step-count 0) (def target [300 300]) (def increment 0.
